verbs.description: [ARG0: Lawyers for President Trump] [V: told] [ARG2: Special Counsel Robert Mueller] [ARGM-LOC: in a confidential letter] [ARG1: that the president would not comply with requests for an interview , could end the special counsel 's investigation and could use his executive powers to pardon if needed] .
